deals.name: 1,500 live ladybugs
itemFeatures: Larvae are black alligator looking crawling insects with orange spots
Including; Aphids, Moth eggs, Mites, Scales, Thrips

deals.name: Uranium ore
deals.dealDescription: Uranium Ore from Naturally Ocurring Radioactive Materials
itemFeatures: Radioactive Ore Sample (NORM) Naturally Occurring Radioactive Materials
Useful for testing Geiger counters and performing nuclear experiments
Shipping compiles to NRC and postal regulations

deals.name: Dill pickle lip balm
deals.dealDescription: Makes mouths to be minty fresh, or sweetly scented.
itemFeatures: tasty lip-smacking flavor with all the protection of a traditional lip balm.

deals.name: A pail of 10 preserved crayfish
deals.dealDescription: For those in the market for crayfish you can keep forever without any upkeep, look no further.
itemFeatures: Crayfish are members of the phylum Arthropoda
Perfect specimens to convey to students the relationship between structure, function, and the environment

deals.name: A pigeon mask
deals.dealDescription: You can finally roam the neighborhood in peace disguised in this lifelike pigeon mask.
